messages.text: You're walking on the [UL]street[ENDUL] 🛣 on a [UL]hot[ENDUL] 🥵 day. It's lunch time and you are [UL]starving[ENDUL]! 🤤 [BR] You go through the door of a small [UL]restaurant[ENDUL]. 🍽 [BR] Please press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.

Excellent choice. I'll have that for you right away. [BR] And what would you like to eat?
Umm... I'd like to try the [UL]chicken[ENDUL] [UL]soup[ENDUL], 🍲 please.

Mmm... this [UL]chicken[ENDUL] [UL]soup[ENDUL] 🍲 is [UL]delicious[ENDUL]! I can hardly put down my [UL]spoon[ENDUL]. 🥄
Hmm... I'd like to try the [UL]green[ENDUL] [UL]salad[ENDUL], 🥗 please.
Fantastic. Here is your [UL]green[ENDUL] [UL]salad[ENDUL] 🥗 and your [UL]fruit[ENDUL] [UL]juice[ENDUL]. 🧃 [BR] Enjoy your meal!
Your [UL]green[ENDUL] [UL]salad[ENDUL] 🥗 looks fantastic. [BR] What [UL]utensil[ENDUL] will you use to eat it?
That's kind of strange. 😓 [BR] Why would you eat [UL]salad[ENDUL] 🥗 with a [UL]spoon[ENDUL]? 🥄 Try again!
Mmm... this [UL]green[ENDUL] [UL]salad[ENDUL] 🥗 is [UL]delicious[ENDUL]! I can hardly put down my [UL]fork[ENDUL]. 🍴

Wow... this [UL]sweet[ENDUL] [UL]waffle[ENDUL] 🧇 is [UL]delicious[ENDUL]! I'm putting my [UL]knife[ENDUL] and [UL]fork[ENDUL] down, 🍴 feeling totally satisfied.

Good afternoon! [BR] How was your [UL]meal[ENDUL] today?
Hey, don't be [UL]rude[ENDUL]! 😡 [BR] Give your [UL]compliments[ENDUL] to the [UL]chef[ENDUL] 👩🏻‍🍳 for the wonderful [UL]meal[ENDUL] you had!

I'm glad you enjoyed it. [BR] [BR] Here is your check. Now, how would you like to pay? We take [UL]cash[ENDUL] and [UL]credit[ENDUL] [UL]cards[ENDUL].

Oops! You haven't got enough [UL]cash[ENDUL] with those few [UL]coins[ENDUL]. 🪙 [BR] [BR] Please choose a different [UL]payment[ENDUL] [UL]method[ENDUL].
Congratulations! You paid by [UL]credit[ENDUL] [UL]card[ENDUL] 💳 and left the restaurant. [BR] [BR] You have completed this lesson. [BR] Press the button on the bottom of the screen to exit.

Estás caminando por la [UL]calle[ENDUL] 🛣 en un día [UL]caluroso[ENDUL]. 🥵 Es la hora del almuerzo y tienes mucha [UL]hambre[ENDUL]! 🤤 [BR] Entras por la puerta de un pequeño [UL]restaurante[ENDUL]. 🍽 [BR] Por favor, presiona el botón en la parte inferior de la pantalla para continuar.

Hmm... Me gustaría probar la [UL]ensalada[ENDUL] [UL]verde[ENDUL], 🥗 por favor.

¡Buenas tardes! [BR] ¿Cómo estuvo tu [UL]comida[ENDUL] hoy?
